Interface ConvertStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultConvertStrategy
public interface ConvertStrategy

A strategy to convert binary data in large objects

Method Detail

convert

long convert(java.lang.Object data)
Convert the given data to a binary object and return the replacement OID

Parameters:
data - the data to convert
Returns:
the OID that should replace the converted data in the object that holds the data, or 0 (zero) if the data was not converted

convert

                         throws java.io.IOException
Load the binary data with the given OID and convert it back to an object

Parameters:
oid - the OID
Returns:
the converted object
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the binary data could not be read
